programme.title: Alarmi i kuq
programme.desc: Një task forcë në garë me kohën për të ndalur shpërthimin e një vullkani shkatërrues, duhet të realizojnë një plan të çmendur shpëtimi: Të krijojë një shpërthim tjetër edhe më të fuqishëm...
programme.category: Kinemaja aziatike

programme.title: Dita e 6-të
programme.desc: A.Schwarzenegger. Nje pilot helikopteri shpeton nga nje aksident ku 'duhej te vdiste'. Kur kthehet ne shtepi, zbulon se nje shkencetar e ka zevendesuar me nje kopje te klonuar, dhe gjithçka eshte pjese e nje plani per te zoteruar boten.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Pelegrinazhi
programme.desc: Martin Sheen, Emilio Estevez. I shkatërruar nga dhimbja e vdekjes së të birit, i cili kishte ndërmarrë një udhëtim drejt 'El camino de Santiago', një baba niset për të gjetur eshtrat e tij dhe vendos të përshkojë të njëjtin rrugëtim...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Nderi i Tomit
programme.desc: Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë dhe frymëzuese të marrëdhënies sfiduese mes Tom Morris-it të Vjetër dhe Tom Morris-it të Ri, ekipi dinamik babë e bir, që themeloi lojën moderne të sportit të golfit.
programme.category: Dramë
histori

programme.title: Brenda dhimbjes
programme.desc: Olivia Wilde, Luke Wilson. Një vit pas rrëmbimit të djalit të tyre, një polic dhe gruaja e tij sa vijnë e zhyten më shumë në dhimbjen dhe ndjenjën e fajësisë që i ka pushtuar...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Vit i paharrueshëm
programme.desc: Diane Lane, John Malkovich. Në vitin 1973, një vajzë e re së bashku me një trajner, stërvisin nje kalë për ta bërë kampion absolut të atij viti të paharruar...
programme.category: SportLife

programme.title: Si të flasësh me vajzat në feste
programme.desc: Elle Fanning. Bazuar në tregimin e Neil Gaiman. Një histori mbi lindjen e kulturës Pank, mbi entuziazmin e dashurisë së parë dhe misterit më të madh të univerisit: Si të flasësh me vajzave në festë.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Beteja e Pashendalit
programme.desc: Paul Gross, Caroline Dhavernas. Gjatë Luftës së Parë Botërore, jetët e një ushtari, një infermiereje dhe një djaloshi naiv, ndërthuren fillimisht në Kanada, e më pas në betejën e Pashendalit në Belgjikë.
programme.category: Histori e vërtetë

programme.title: Grushti i jetës
programme.desc: 2015. Jake Gyllenhaal. I përballur me një tragjedi, kampioni i boksit Billi Houp, rrezikon të humbasë gjithçka, madje edhe kujdestarinë e vajzës. I vendosur për të rivënë në vijë jetën e tij, ai kërkon ndihmën e një trajneri të vjetër.
programme.category: Sport
dramë

programme.title: Rini e çmendur
programme.desc: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone. Një djalë dhe një vajzë takohen në dy momente vendimtare në jetën e tyre. Njëherë kur sapo kanë mbaruar universitetin dhe vite më vonë, kur të dy kanë relizuar shumë ëndrra, por kanë edhe shumë të tjera.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Ingridi shkon në perëndim
programme.desc: Aubrey Plaza, Elizabeth Olsen. Një vajzë e paqëndrueshme mendërisht, e cila është fiksuar pas një ylli të Instagramit, shpërngulet në Los Anxhelos dhe bën gjithçka që të miqësohet me të.
programme.category: Dramë
komedi e zezë

programme.title: Armët e zemrës
programme.desc: Priscilla C. Shirer, T.C. Stallings, Karen Abercrombie. Një familje në dukje perfekte përpiqet të rregullojë problemet me ndihmën e një gruaje të vjetër në moshë...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Tuskaluza
programme.desc: Alabama, 1972. I sapodiplomuari Billi dashurohet me një paciente ndërsa punon në spitalin psikiatrik të drejtuar nga i ati, i cili ka lidhje me pushtetin. Por kur miku i tij përfshihet në një lëvizje të të drejtave civile kundër elitës drejtuese, ai vihet.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Plazhisti
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey, Snoop Dogg, Isla Fisher, Zac Efron. Aventurat gazmore të Moondog, një poet rebel pa parime, që pavarësisht të papriturave, do ta jetojë gjithmonë jetën sipas rregullave të tij.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Beteja mes sekseve
programme.desc: Emma Stone, Steve Carell. Historia e vërtetë e përballjes në vitin 1973, midis numrit 1 në tenis për femra Billie Jean King dhe ish-kampionit të meshkujven Bobby Riggs.
programme.category: Biografi
sport

programme.title: Hakmarrje e modës së lartë
programme.desc: Kate Winslet, Liam Hemsworth. Një rrobaqepëse e talentuar dhe bukuroshe rikthehet në qytezën e saj në Australi. Me makinën qepëse dhe me stilin e bukur të veshjes, ajo ndryshon jetën e grave dhe hakmerret për të kaluarën e saj.
programme.category: Dramë
komedi

programme.title: Kujtime italiane
programme.desc: Liam Neeson. Një baba dhe djali i tij, me të cilin ka një raport të ftohtë, rikthehen në Toskanën e mrekullueshme për të riparuar vilën e tyre të vjetër familjare, por, pa e ditur, do të riparojnë edhe lidhjen e tyre.
programme.category: Komedi
dramë

programme.title: Heshtja
programme.desc: Stanley Tucci, Kiernan Shipka. Ndërsa bota është nën sulmin e krijesave vdekjeprurëse që gjuajnë prenë e tyre nga zhurmat, një adoleshente shurdhe dhe familja e saj kërkojnë strehim jashtë qytetit dhe përballen me një kult misterioz.
programme.category: Horror
thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Vera e fundit
programme.desc: KJ Apa, Maia Mitchell. Një grup miqsh adoleshentë në Çikago përballen me ëndrrat, marrëdhëniet dhe identitetet e tyre përgjatë një vere plot tension; verës së tyre të fundit së bashku para se të shkojnë në universitet.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Me ritmin e ëndrrave
programme.desc: Kur pranimi në universitetin e ëndrrave varet nga performanca e saj në një konkurs vallëzimi, një vajzë studioze formon një grup kërcimi për të mundur skuadrën më të mirë në shkollë. Tani asaj i duhet thjesht të mësojë si të kërcejë.
programme.category: Komedi
kërcim
muzikë

programme.title: E urrej verën
programme.desc: Aldo, Xhovani dhe Xhakomo. Tre familje shumë të ndryshme nga njëra tjetra, përfundojnë për pushime në të njëjtën shtëpi me qera. Gjatë verës, ata bëhen miq dhe rizbulojnë sesi të shijojnë jetën...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Shpërthim hakmarrës
programme.desc: Kate Beckinsale. Një vajzë e re, e cila vuan nga 'çrregullimet e shpërthimeve të dhunës', e kontrollon sëmundjen falë një makinerie. Por kur miku i saj gjendet i vrarë, ajo vendos ta lërë të lirë impulsin e saj vrastar.
programme.category: Aksion
Thriller

programme.title: Gruaja e kopshtit zoologjik
programme.desc: Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh. Historia e vërtetë e kujdestarëve të kopshtit zoologjik të Vrashavës, Antonina and Jan Zabinski, të cilët ndihmuan në shpëtimin e qindra njerëzve dhe kafshëve gjatë pushtimit nazist.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë
luftë

programme.title: Gjeniu i timonit
programme.desc: Nje shofer i ri, shpalos me se miri talentin per t'u arratisur pas grabitjeve vetem kur degjon muziken e tij te preferuar. Kur takon vajzen e endrrave, ai sheh nje mundesi per te lene pas jeten e krimit. Por pasi detyrohet te punoje me një kriminel,.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Rrjeti i Grerëzave
programme.desc: Penélope Cruz, Edgar Ramírez, Gael García Bernal. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Havana, Dhjetor 1990. René González, një pilot kubanez, arratiset nga vendi drejt Miamit, me qëllimin për të shkatërruar regjimin brutal të Kastros. Por përpjekjet e tij do të.
programme.category: Drama
Thriller
Krim

programme.title: Ngritja dhe rënia e Fatalit
programme.desc: Fatali, është një muziknat i suksesshëm që duket sikur i ka të gjitha. Por në të vërtetë ai nuk e di as ku po shkon dhe as nga ka ardhur, sepse që në fillim ka gënjyer njerëzit për vendlindjen e tij.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Maratone martesash
programme.desc: Nje plejboi milioner në prag te marteses me te bijen e njeriut me te fuqishem ne Hollivud takon papritur vajzen e endrrave te tij, nje kengetare. Eshte magjepsje me shikim te pare! Alec Baldwin dhe Kim Basinger ne nje romance te paharrueshme.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Në mision me gjyshin
programme.desc: 2017. James Caan. Takimi i shumëpritur i Xhejkut me vajzën e tij të ëndrrave merr kthesë të paparitur kur ajo zhduket. Gjyshi i tij, ish agjent i fshehtë, thërret shokët e vjetër nga Lufta II Botërore, në një mision final, për ta gjetur atë...
programme.category: Komedi
aksion
familje

programme.title: Profesori i marrosur
programme.desc: Nje profesor teper i shendoshe bie ne dashuri me nje femer shume te bukur. Por permasat e trupit e vene ne siklet, ndaj vendos te pije nje substance kimike qe e ka shpikur vete dhe shnderrohet ne nje djale simpatik e te hedhur.
programme.category: Eddie Murphy

programme.title: Muaj mjalti
programme.desc: Carlo Verdone, sjell një tjetër komedi mjaft zbavitëse në stilin e 'E bardhë, e kuqe dhe...Verdone'. Tre çifte të sapomartuarish, do të ndërmarrin tre muaj mjalti, ku aventurat dhe telashet nuk do të kenë të sosur...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Protagonistja
programme.desc: Nje mësuese drame nga Britania bind nje fermer cinik nga Besfordi që ta pergatisë per rolin e nje heroine lufte Afrikane. Ne këmbim, ajo merr përsipër të drejtoje koncertin e përvitshem te fermes Uillemse.
programme.category: Komedi Romantike

programme.title: Hal Mendjelehti
programme.desc: Hali dëshiron të shoqërohet vetëm me vajza të bukura, por ato s'ia hedhin as sytë. Takimi me një 'guru' e bën qe ai t'i shohe të gjitha vajzat njësoj. Kështu dashurohet me Rozmarine, por kur hipnoza zhduket, zbulon se ajo peshon dyfishin e tij.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Receta e dashurisë
programme.desc: Në kërkim të shijes autentike që do të risjellë lavdinë e rrjetit tij të restoranteve, një trashëgimtar i ri zbulon personin e përkryer që do të ndryshojë biznesin e tij. Por në fakt, është jeta e tij që do të ndryshojë pas takimit me të...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Çfarë ndodh në Vegas
programme.desc: Cameron Diaz, Ashton Kutcher. Të martuar pas një nate festash në Las Vegas, dy njerëz të panjohur i 'thërrasin mendjes' dhe kërkojnë të ndahen. Por në atë moment fitojnë një shumë të madhe parash dhe këtu fillon beteja se kush do t'i marrë.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Në vendin tënd
programme.desc: Luca Argentero, Ambra Angiolini. Dy burra ambiciozë dhe shumë të ndryshëm, garojnë për të njëjtin vend pune. Meqë detyra kërkon aftësitë e të dyve, ata detyrohen të këmbejnë jetët me njëri-tjetrin për të plotësuar atë pjesë që u mungon...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Pantera rozë 2
programme.desc: Steve Martin. Pas vjedhjes së një serie stolish legjendare, nder të cilat dhe i paçmueshmi diamanti i Panterës Rozë, shefi i policisë detyrohet t'ia besojë çështjen Inspektorit Kluzo, një ngatërrestari të pandreqshëm, i shpenguar e pa përvojë.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Ekipi i Lazerit 2
programme.desc: Pasi shpëtojnë mrekullisht botën nga pushtimi alien, presioni i famës së papritur largon nga njëri-tjetri heronjtë e "Ekipit të Lazerit". Por kur miku i tyre humbet në një tjetër dimension, ata duhet të ribashkohen nëse duan ta shpëtojnë.
programme.category: Komedi
fantashkencë

programme.title: Ali G
programme.desc: Si pa dashje do te behet pjese e planit dinak te nje politikani per te rrezuar nga pushteti Kryeministrin. Por ai eshte i paparashikueshem, i pamposhtur dhe do te shnderrohet ne 'Heroin e brezit te ri' duke bere per vete nje popull te tere.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Aventurë në galaktikë
programme.desc: Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Tony Shalhoub. Parodi e sagës "Startrek". Disa aktorë që vite më parë ishin pjesë e një serial fantastiko-shkencor, duhet të ndihmojnë një racë jashtëtokësorësh, që mendojnë se ata janë heronj të vërtetë.
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Erdhi cirku
programme.desc: Tre komedianët e njohur italianë, në skenë me një seri skeçesh, me batuta e role si; murgj, kirgurgë të paaftë, policë të forcave speciale, barabarë, magjistarë, aventurierë e parodi të disa filmave të njohur amerikanë...
programme.category: Aldo
Giovanni & Giacomo

programme.title: Dasmë në Long Ajlënd
programme.desc: 2018. Adam Sandler, Chris Rock. Dy baballarë me karaktere të ndryshëm dhe pikëpamje krejt të kundërta për organizimin e dasmës së fëmijëve të tyre, pëpiqen të ruajnë gjakftohtësinë gjatë javës kaotike përpara ditës së madhe...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Togeri Bilko
programme.desc: Steve Martin. Togeri Bilko është përgjegjësi i një baze ushtarake, ku mundësitë e argëtimit s'mungojnë. Kur një armik i vjetër vjen për kontroll, ai do të shpalosë gjithë aftësitë e tij për të sabotuar etjen e tjetrit për hakmarje.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: I pasuri, i varfri dhe maxhordomi
programme.desc: Filmi i fundit i Aldo, Xhovani e Xhakomos. Një ditë të bukur, Xhakomo, nje pasanik i regjur, humb gjithcka. Me ndihmën e maxhordomit të tij dhe një shitësi ambulant të cilin e përplas me makinë, ai do arrijë të gjej një zgjidhje.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Po ky nga doli?
programme.desc: Kur Tereza e fton Simonin, te fejuarin e saj, ne festen e 25-vjetorit te marteses se prinderve, kishte harruar t'u thoshte që ai ishte i bardhe. I bindur per ta prishur kete fejese, baba Xhoni, do beje gjithçka qe Simoni te ndjehet si dele e zeze.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Shpikja e gënjeshtrës
programme.desc: Ricky Gervais, Jennifer Garner, Jonah Hill. Në një botë ku të gjithë thonë vetëm të vërtetën, një shkrimtar i dështuar do të ndryshojë fatin e tij duke shpikur gënjeshtrën dhe duke e përdorur atë për të arritur gjithçka që do...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: 24 orë për të jetuar
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke. Pasi një mercenar vritet në një betejë të pëgjakshme, një operacion rigjenerues i jep një mundësi të re për të jetuar dhe për shëlbim.
programme.category: Thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Ligji i më të fortit
programme.desc: Christian Bale, Woody Harrelson. Pasi zhdukja e të vëllait nuk hetohet ne kohë nga policia, Rasëlli, veteran i luftës së Irakut, vendos ta marrë vetë situatën në dorë.
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Kanali
programme.desc: 2014. Davidi, një arkivist filmi, fillon të humbasë arsyen pasi zbulon nga një filmim të vjetër se shtëpia në të cilën është transferuar me familjen, ka qënë skena e një vrasjeje të përgjakshme në fillim të viteve 1900.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Jetë me afat
programme.desc: Vince Vaughn, Hailee Steinfeld. Një grabitës profesionist dhe vajza e tij, përpiqen t'i shpëtojnë hakmarrjes së një krimineli dhe plumbave të disa policëve të korruptuar.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Të sulmuar në shtëpi
programme.desc: Natasha Henstridge, Jason Patric. Kur nje grua dhe thjeshtri i saj sulmohen brenda shtëpisë nga 3 grabitës profesionistë, ndihma e vetme i vjen përmes telefonit nga një specialist i sistemit të sigurisë...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Kur thyhet një degë
programme.desc: 2016.Morris Chestnut, Regina Hall, Jaz Sinclair. Martesa e një çifti vihet në rrezik kur vajza që kanë përzgjedhur si surrogatja e fëmijës se tyre, kërkon të ketë burrin dhe fëmijën brenda saj për vete...
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Figura misterioze
programme.desc: 2020. Mary J. Blige. Ndërsa heton vrasjen e çuditshme të kolegut, një police veterane zbulon një figurë misterioze në filmimet e kamerës së trupit dhe fillon të dyshojë se diçka e mbinatyrshme po përndjek policët në njësinë e saj...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Lugina e tmerrit
programme.desc: Johnny Depp. Ikabod Krein, nje hetues ne mendjen e te cili s'ka vend per mistere e legjenda, dergohet per te hetuar mbi nje sere vrasjesh te mistershme. Sipas vendasve ato jane veper e te ashtequajturit Kaloresi pa Koke.
programme.category: Fantazi
horror

programme.title: Lajmësi duhet vrarë
programme.desc: Jeremy Renner. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të gazetarit fitues të çmimit Pulitzer, Gary Webb. Ne mesin e viteve 1990, ai zbulon se trafikimi i kokainës në Amerikë, kryhej nga vetë C.I.A. Ai vendos për të publikuar të gjitha faktet...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Prometeu
programme.desc: N.Rapace, M.Fassbender, Ch.Theron. Nga regjisori Ridley Scott, vjen një film fantashkencë i papërsëritshëm. Nje grup shkencëtarësh zbulojnë disa shpella me të dhëna që mund të tregojnë zanafillën e njerëzimit. Por cfarë fshihet pas tyre?
programme.category: Mister
fantashkencë
aventurë

programme.title: E çuditshme, por e vërtetë
programme.desc: Margaret Qualley, Greg Kinnear. Një familje e qetë përfshihet në një mister të errët kur ish e dashura e djalit të tyre të ndjerë, shfaqet pesë vjet pas vdekjes se tij dhe u rrëfen se është shtatëzënë me fëmijën e djalit të tyre.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Ekipi Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Steve Carell, Channing Tatum, Mark Ruffalo. Film kandidat për 5 çmime Oskar. Bazuar në ngjarje të vërteta, kjo është historia mahnitëse dhe tragjike mes një milioneri dhe dy vëllezërve kampionë në mundje...
programme.category: Sport
Krim

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
Štrumpfovi 2
programme.desc:
The Smurfs 2: Directed by Raja Gosnell. With Hank Azaria, Neil Patrick Harris, Brendan Gleeson, Jayma Mays. The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been abducted by Gargamel, since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation, creatures called "The Naughties", into real Smurfs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2017020/","name":"The Smurfs 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGI0OTUwNTItZTU0Yy00YmMzLTlkNjQtZDJjZTI2YTliZTM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been abducted by Gargamel, since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation, creatures called "The Naughties", into real Smurfs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2017020/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Thanos_Alfie"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worse than the first...","reviewBody":""The Smurfs 2" is an Animation - Comedy movie and the sequel of the movie "The Smurfs" in which we watch the Smurfs in new trouble as Gargamel abducts Smurfette and they have to do their best in order to take her back. Gargamel abducted Smurfette because he wants to her to tell him the secret spell with which he can transform his newest creations "The Naughties" into real Smurfs. The Smurfs will team up with their human friends in order to rescue Smurfette before it will be too late.

Since I had already watched the first movie I was expecting from the second to be better something that I thought it wouldn't be so difficult since the first was very bad. Unfortunately for one more time, I was disappointed because believe it or not this movie is even worse than the first one. I didn't like the whole concept of the movie, it was boring and with not any funny moments. The only thing that I liked it was the interpretations of Neil Patrick Harris who played as Patrick Winslow and Brendan Gleeson who played as Victor but in my opinion weren't enough to make this movie more interesting or watchable. Regarding the direction which was made once more by Raja Gosnell was average and worse than the first.

To sum up, "The Smurfs 2" is a poor movie with not many good or funny scenes, average direction and in comparison with the first movie I have to say that this was even worse. I don't recommend anyone to watch this movie because I believe that you are going to waste your time and I am sure that you won't like it at all.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":40206,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2013-09-11","keywords":"based on cartoon,sequel,new york city,3 dimensional,live action cgi hybrid","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2897651993","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzQxNjNiZGUtM2RlMC00YWE4LWE2ODItMDZlODAzNzc0MGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzQxNjNiZGUtM2RlMC00YWE4LWE2ODItMDZlODAzNzc0MGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been kidnapped by Gargamel since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation - creatures called the Naughties - into real Smurfs."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000439/","name":"Neil Patrick Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1724323/","name":"Jayma Mays"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2953537/","name":"Katy Perry"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331532/","name":"Raja Gosnell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316575/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0826425/","name":"J. programme.title: Batman Begins
Betmen: Početak
programme.desc: Batman Begins: Directed by Christopher Nolan. With Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Katie Holmes. After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0372784/","name":"Batman Begins","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY4YjI2N2MtYmFlMC00ZjcyLTg3YjEtMDQyM2ZjYzQ5YWFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0372784/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"streetsmarts101"},"dateCreated":"2005-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Finally!!!","reviewBody":"I got a chance to see 'Batman Begins' just this past Friday evening. I must say that before seeing the film, I felt in my heart this is the 'Batman' film we've been waiting for. Within ten minutes into the movie, I turned to my date and said to her, "This is it! This is the movie!" I just can't believe that after all these years, Warner Bros. finally got it right. For me the most intriguing part of the film, apart from the great script, and great acting, was Christopher Nolan's decision to base the film in reality. Deciding that Batman could really exist in our universe and our world was a stroke of genius. Another aspect of the film that's so refreshing is that instead of the focus being on the villain, Batman is the film's star. And rightly so. It's amazing what can happen when a studio leaves a respected director, and the creative team alone, and allow them to make the best movie possible. The only two negatives that I can think of is Katie Holmes and the fight sequences. Holmes does indeed look like a teenager playing grown-up. Her performance isn't bad per SE, it's just that you really don't buy her as an Assistant D.A. As for the fight sequences, I felt the cameras angles were too tight on the action, edited too quickly, and lit too dark so that you really couldn't tell what was going on and determine who was hitting who. Maybe we can attribute this to the fact that Nolan is not an action director. Hopefully the next film will open up the fight sequences so we can actually see Batman use the martial arts skills he developed during his exile. But apart from those relatively minor quibbles, the film is excellent, and I'm definitely going back on opening day June 15th, and seeing it a second time. A third and fourth viewing is definitely not out of the question.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1365346,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2005-06-16","keywords":"superhero,social decay,dc comics,gotham,well","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"4K Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi362988313","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJhYTcxYzgtOTI3My00ZTI1LWI3NzAtZTljMTFjM2ViOGYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJhYTcxYzgtOTI3My00ZTI1LWI3NzAtZTljMTFjM2ViOGYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg","description":"After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0913822/","name":"Ken Watanabe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0634240/","name":"Christopher Nolan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147954/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038332/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004170/","name":"Bob Kane"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275286/","name":"David S. Goyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0634240/","name":"Christopher Nolan"}],"duration":"PT2H20M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tenet
Tenet
programme.desc: Tenet: Directed by Christopher Nolan. With Juhan Ulfsak, Jefferson Hall, Ivo Uukkivi, Andrew Howard. Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6723592/","name":"Tenet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg0NGM2NjAtNmIxOC00MDJmLTg5ZmYtYzM0MTE4NWE2NzlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA4NjE0NjEy._V1_.jpg","description":"Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6723592/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oreniaplen"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"As a massive Nolan fan, this film is almost perplexing to the point where it's just plain ridiculous plotting.","reviewBody":"Listen we all know Nolan swings for the fences of what's possible and pushes the realms of normality. This film for whatever reason just doesn't mesh together the way most of his films do even with complex suspension of disbelief aspects. It's often scattered and juxtaposed to a near outrageous level. The visuals are spectacular at times but also seem way too extravagant to take seriously other times. Robert Pattinson is flawless and probably the standout of the film with his vigorous performance. The same cannot be said about John David Washington's barren and emotionless lack of effort. I can't believe he was given the starring role. He brings the interest level down to almost unwatchable levels. Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6723592/","name":"Tenet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg0NGM2NjAtNmIxOC00MDJmLTg5ZmYtYzM0MTE4NWE2NzlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA4NjE0NjEy._V1_.jpg","description":"Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6723592/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"oreniaplen","dateCreated":"2020-08-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"As a massive Nolan fan, this film is almost perplexing to the point where it's just plain ridiculous plotting.","reviewBody":"Listen we all know Nolan swings for the fences of what's possible and pushes the realms of normality. This film for whatever reason just doesn't mesh together the way most of his films do even with complex suspension of disbelief aspects. It's often scattered and juxtaposed to a near outrageous level. The visuals are spectacular at times but also seem way too extravagant to take seriously other times. Robert Pattinson is flawless and probably the standout of the film with his vigorous performance. The same cannot be said about John David Washington's barren and emotionless lack of effort. I can't believe he was given the starring role. He brings the interest level down to almost unwatchable levels. programme.title: Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc: Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće. Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. Svaka epizoda daje Oliveru jedinstvenu platformu odakle može nuditi svoje specifično gledište o svjetskim problemima uz razne posebne goste i segmente.

programme.desc: The White Lotus: Created by Mike White. With Jennifer Coolidge, Murray Bartlett, Connie Britton, Alexandra Daddario. Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt13406094/","name":"The White Lotus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY1YjY1MWUtYWY5Yi00YTM4LTkyM2UtMDQ3NmFiYTkyYjlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt13406094/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"getyourTVtogether"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"New Genre: CRINGE","reviewBody":"Welcome to the new genre of "Cringe". High production values; stellar acting. Want to relax by feeling uncomfortable for 6 hours? This is the show for you!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36928,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-07-11","keywords":"male explicit nudity,satire,social commentary,one week time span,social satire","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177639/","name":"Jennifer Coolidge"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058864/","name":"Murray Bartlett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0110168/","name":"Connie Britton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193472/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925234/","name":"Mike White"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1544732697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Among the employees at The White Lotus are the fastidious resort manager Armond (Murray Bartlett), who, after a sudden trauma, begins a dramatic downward spiral - and the down-to-earth spa manager, Belinda (Natasha Rothwell) who gets taken on an emotional roller coaster ride by a needy guest. The vacationers include the Mossbacher family - Nicole (Connie Britton), a successful type-A exec, who can't help but treat her family like disobedient employees; her husband, Mark (Steve Zahn), dealing with both an embarrassing health crisis and a terminal inferiority complex; their teenaged son, Quinn (Fred Hechinger), a socially awkward gamer, experiencing the wonder of nature for the very first time; their daughter, Olivia (Sydney Sweeney), and her friend, Paula (Brittany O'Grady), sharp-tongued college sophomores who cast a sardonic eye on the lifestyles and belief systems of everyone around them. The handsome, entitled Shane Patton (Jake Lacy) is here with his beautiful bride, Rachel (Alexandra Daddario). Shane and Rachel are in the throes of young love, but as they get to know each other better in this new, intimate environment, clouds of doubt appear - and by the time Shane's intrusive mother, Kitty (Molly Shannon) surprises them with an unwelcome visit, their fairytale honeymoon has begun to unravel. And finally, there is Tanya McQuoid (Jennifer Coolidge), a wealthy, unstable woman, recovering from the death of her mother, traveling alone to the hotel, looking for love and in desperate need of a massage."}}</script><metacontent="

The vacationers include the Mossbacher family - Nicole (Connie Britton), a successful type-A exec, who can't help but treat her family like disobedient employees; her husband, Mark (Steve Zahn), dealing with both an embarrassing health crisis and a terminal inferiority complex; their teenaged son, Quinn (Fred Hechinger), a socially awkward gamer, experiencing the wonder of nature for the very first time; their daughter, Olivia (Sydney Sweeney), and her friend, Paula (Brittany O'Grady), sharp-tongued college sophomores who cast a sardonic eye on the lifestyles and belief systems of everyone around them. The handsome, entitled Shane Patton (Jake Lacy) is here with his beautiful bride, Rachel (Alexandra Daddario). Shane and Rachel are in the throes of young love, but as they get to know each other better in this new, intimate environment, clouds of doubt appear - and by the time Shane's intrusive mother, Kitty (Molly Shannon) surprises them with an unwelcome visit, their fairytale honeymoon has begun to unravel. And finally, there is Tanya McQuoid (Jennifer Coolidge), a wealthy, unstable woman, recovering from the death of her mother, traveling alone to the hotel, looking for love and in desperate need of a massage."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Logan
Logan
programme.desc:
Logan: Directed by James Mangold. With Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen, Boyd Holbrook. In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3315342/","name":"Logan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzc5MTU4N2EtYTkyMi00NjdhLTg3NWEtMTY4OTEyMzJhZTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3315342/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"trublu215"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"If there was ever a comic book movie deemed worthy of perfect, Logan is it.","reviewBody":"The word 'perfect' is very objective especially when it comes to film. While Logan may not be a perfect film, it is most certainly a perfect comic book film. It is a masterpiece of the most epic proportions and leaves us with a brilliant swan song for producer and star Hugh Jackman in his final outing as Wolverine. The film, directed brilliantly by James Mangold, is a two plus hour comic book fan's wet dream as we see the version of Wolverine every fan has wanted to see for nearly two decades. While many will be very sad to see Jackman step down from the role, he couldn't have picked a better or more satisfying film to end his cinematic legacy with.

The film takes place in 2029 and shows the world in shambles. Mutants are nearly extinct, water is scarce and the world is just an overall wasteland. This is where we find Logan. He is a limo driving cantankerous caretaker to an even more cantankerous Professor X, who is now suffering from dementia and seizures. He is a borderline alcoholic suffering from a mysterious illness that limits his mutant abilities. Due to this, he lives this quiet life until he meets a young girl who he feels he must protect. Without giving too much away, there is much more here than I can go into but I will say, if you are a fan of the Wolverine comics, this film will bring a tear to your eye. This is probably the most faithful adaptation of a comic book character EVER, Marvel and DC combined. The way the story goes, the way Logan behaves, the selflessness and the rage, this is an all around realized version of this character. While it may have taken a little longer than it should have, this film was worth the wait. James Mangold does a fantastic job at creating the world Logan knows now. This is more of a film like Mangold's 3:10 to Yuma. It is bleak, violent and absolutely heartbreaking. This is far from the PG-13 character we're used to. This is a foul mouthed, miserable and very VERY bloody rendition of the source material. This is a film very much like The Guantlet or Badlands, a crime thriller and on-the-road drama. It very much embodies the look and feel of a film from the mid-70s and it plays to this very well. 

The performances in this film are amazing. Hugh Jackman's performance here is the best as the character and may be one of the best of his career. He is miserable and broken in this film and to see him like this as the character, it is bittersweet especially because Jackman has been so attached to this role. If he hurts, we hurt. If he's mad, we're mad. It is a true testament to Jackman as an actor to make his audience feel this connected to someone who is, by traditional standards, completely unrelateable. Boyd Holbrook brings a sinister performance to this and continues to build a very impressive resume. Holbrook is someone who you'll love to hate. The real standout performance here is from Dafne Keen who plays Laura. Without giving away any spoilers, she is BADASS in this film and even gives Logan a run for his money on the brutality.

Overall, Logan is a perfect comic book adaptation that is as heartbreaking as it is visually stunning. Mangold and Jackman create a special film with this that should be talked about for years to come. Believe the hype, Logan is a seriously amazing comic book film that just may be the best ever made and embodies the definition of a perfect adaptation.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":691185,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2017-03-03","keywords":"marvel comics,x men,superhero,mutant,north dakota","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Super Bowl Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1946727961","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU3NmY1NTktOTY5NC00NzY0LTk1YzUtYzBmYWFhNDhiMDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU3NmY1NTktOTY5NC00NzY0LTk1YzUtYzBmYWFhNDhiMDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the Super Bowl Spot for 'Logan.'"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001772/","name":"Patrick Stewart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6748436/","name":"Dafne Keen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0291082/","name":"Scott Frank"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338169/","name":"Michael Green"}],"duration":"PT2H17M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Deadpool 2
Deadpool 2
programme.desc:
Deadpool 2: Directed by David Leitch. With Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Morena Baccarin, Julian Dennison. Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5463162/","name":"Deadpool 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDkzNmRhNTMtZDI4NC00Zjg1LTgxM2QtMjYxZDQ3OWJlMDRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU5MjkzMTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5463162/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Honest review of all 3 versions","reviewBody":"It's true that you can have too much of a good thing...please no more different editions!

THEATRICAL CUT - was the best version of any of the "cuts" it was the most cleanly edited and it had the best soundtrack out of the three. It is clear after seeing all the versions of the film that they tested all of the jokes and the ones included were cherry picked, and the best were picked to be included in this one.

SUPER DUPER CUT/EXTENDED - this was supposed to be an extended version of the film but it was actually a different cut...what I mean by that is that they changed the soundtrack and they cut out what I considered to be some of the funniest jokes from the theatrical cut and replaced them. They ALSO added some additional footage to the film after making those changes. This version of the film feels darker and less funny to me personally so I prefer the theatrical cut over it.

ONCE UPON A DEADPOOL/PG13 - This is the edition that nobody asked for and is the most unnecessary. From an editing standpoint this version of film is very sloppy, and seems like one giant montage. They don't even start this version of the film out at the beginning it jumps right into the "safe room scene". A lot of the footage included in this edition was already available on the home releases and online (apart from the short amount filmed with Fred Savage). The movie would end up edited on TV regardless of this edition existing or not. So in reality there was no need for this edition to exist apart from making more money.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":521716,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2018-05-18","keywords":"anti hero,japanese girl,based on comic book,marvel comics,superhero","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2984557081","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNzViMzEtYTEyMS00MWIyLTkzY2UtZTRlMWViNTJlNGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNzViMzEtYTEyMS00MWIyLTkzY2UtZTRlMWViNTJlNGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Deadpool 2' is heading back to theaters for 12 days from Dec. 12, 2018, re-cut for a PG-13 audience. IMDb data; ttnr: 5463162, Title: Deadpool 2, --- Description: Deadpool 2: Directed by David Leitch. With Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Morena Baccarin, Julian Dennison. Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5463162/","name":"Deadpool 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDkzNmRhNTMtZDI4NC00Zjg1LTgxM2QtMjYxZDQ3OWJlMDRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU5MjkzMTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5463162/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers","dateCreated":"2019-01-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Honest review of all 3 versions","reviewBody":"It's true that you can have too much of a good thing...please no more different editions!

THEATRICAL CUT - was the best version of any of the "cuts" it was the most cleanly edited and it had the best soundtrack out of the three. It is clear after seeing all the versions of the film that they tested all of the jokes and the ones included were cherry picked, and the best were picked to be included in this one.

SUPER DUPER CUT/EXTENDED - this was supposed to be an extended version of the film but it was actually a different cut...what I mean by that is that they changed the soundtrack and they cut out what I considered to be some of the funniest jokes from the theatrical cut and replaced them. They ALSO added some additional footage to the film after making those changes. This version of the film feels darker and less funny to me personally so I prefer the theatrical cut over it.

ONCE UPON A DEADPOOL/PG13 - This is the edition that nobody asked for and is the most unnecessary. From an editing standpoint this version of film is very sloppy, and seems like one giant montage. They don't even start this version of the film out at the beginning it jumps right into the "safe room scene". A lot of the footage included in this edition was already available on the home releases and online (apart from the short amount filmed with Fred Savage). The movie would end up edited on TV regardless of this edition existing or not. So in reality there was no need for this edition to exist apart from making more money.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":521716,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2018-05-18","keywords":"anti hero,japanese girl,based on comic book,marvel comics,superhero","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2984557081","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNzViMzEtYTEyMS00MWIyLTkzY2UtZTRlMWViNTJlNGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNzViMzEtYTEyMS00MWIyLTkzY2UtZTRlMWViNTJlNGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Deadpool 2' is heading back to theaters for 12 days from Dec. 12, 2018, re-cut for a PG-13 audience. programme.title: Gravity
Gravitacija
programme.desc:
Gravity: Directed by Alfonso Cuarón. With Sandra Bullock, George Clooney, Ed Harris, Orto Ignatiussen. Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1454468/","name":"Gravity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE5MzYwMzYxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk4MTk0OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1454468/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"akash_sebastian"},"dateCreated":"2013-10-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Jaw-droppingly Spectacular; It's One Hell of a Ride!","reviewBody":"Jaw-droppingly spectacular; it's one hell of a ride! Alfonso Cuaron, already a well-appreciated Director of artistic genius, takes us on this incredible journey with Dr. Ryan Stone (Sandra Bullock), who gets detached from her shuttle and has to find her way back home (towards Gravity). The harrowing situation itself is stupefying; the stunning visuals, the incredible acting, and the powerful background score just add to the horror. In this era of 3D movies, this is one of the few movies where the 3D effect actually contributes something to the storytelling aspect, as well as the gripping reality of the film. For most of us, this is the closest we can ever get to be in space; it suspends us in a state of weightlessness along with the jeopardized astronauts. 

The acting by the lead, Sandra Bullock, is commendable; the natural portrayal of the character makes the situation more realistic. She single-handedly caries the movie on her shoulders. The well-timed bouts of humour by George Clooney's supporting character, the veteran astronaut Mathew Kowalsky, give us the only comic relief in an otherwise gloomy suspense thriller. The cameo by the ecstatic Indian astronaut singing around "Mera jootha hai Japani" in space was hilarious as well. 

Other than being an adventurous suspense thriller, the slow character- development helps us to form an emotional bond as well. So, by the time the movie reaches climax, you're in it as much as the heroic lead, Dr. Ryan Stone. The mesmerizingly-orchestrated meteoric-shower-like scene of the entering spacecraft, towards the end of the movie, is one of the best executed scenes of cinematic history!

Whether you're a fan of science-fiction thrillers or not, whether you're a fan of 3D films or not, (to quote the lead characters from the movie) either way, it's gonna be one hell of a ride!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":793049,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-10-09","keywords":"space station,female protagonist,sole survivor,self sacrifice,despair","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Main Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2340006169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NDY0MjM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA0NzIzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NDY0MjM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA0NzIzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.

"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000113/","name":"Sandra Bullock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000438/","name":"Ed Harris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0164586/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190861/","name":"Jonás Cuarón"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

Alfonso Cuaron, already a well-appreciated Director of artistic genius, takes us on this incredible journey with Dr. Ryan Stone (Sandra Bullock), who gets detached from her shuttle and has to find her way back home (towards Gravity). The harrowing situation itself is stupefying; the stunning visuals, the incredible acting, and the powerful background score just add to the horror. In this era of 3D movies, this is one of the few movies where the 3D effect actually contributes something to the storytelling aspect, as well as the gripping reality of the film. For most of us, this is the closest we can ever get to be in space; it suspends us in a state of weightlessness along with the jeopardized astronauts. 

The acting by the lead, Sandra Bullock, is commendable; the natural portrayal of the character makes the situation more realistic. She single-handedly caries the movie on her shoulders. The well-timed bouts of humour by George Clooney's supporting character, the veteran astronaut Mathew Kowalsky, give us the only comic relief in an otherwise gloomy suspense thriller. The cameo by the ecstatic Indian astronaut singing around "Mera jootha hai Japani" in space was hilarious as well. 

Other than being an adventurous suspense thriller, the slow character- development helps us to form an emotional bond as well. So, by the time the movie reaches climax, you're in it as much as the heroic lead, Dr. Ryan Stone. The mesmerizingly-orchestrated meteoric-shower-like scene of the entering spacecraft, towards the end of the movie, is one of the best executed scenes of cinematic history!

programme.title: Argo
Argo
programme.desc:
Argo: Directed by Ben Affleck. With Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, Alan Arkin, John Goodman. Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1024648/","name":"Argo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzljNjY3MDYtYzc0Ni00YjU0LWIyNDUtNTE0ZDRiMGExMjZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1024648/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chaos-rampant"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Operation: Dunces with Wolves","reviewBody":"Is there anything worse than competent mediocrity? Because, surely this is competent, perhaps more than competent, professional, well shot. I will put aside for the moment that there is no characterization to speak of here, that it is flimsy as procedural, that its politics are unnecessarily uncomplicated (good CIA battles evil Islam), its tone uncertain, with all the goofy movie-making stuff sticking out like a sore thumb. The film is soulless, painting by numbers. 

The movie was fake after all, but the mission was real.

In Affleck's case, there is something worse. Because you see, he does not attempt to 'write history with lightning', as was said about Birth of a Nation a century ago. He softly rewrites the thing. The Canadian stuff has (rightfully) received the most backlash. Imagine this—the CIA analyst who advised Affleck, there had to be one, thought it would be a good idea to end this insinuating the CIA did all the job, but graciously let Canada reap the publicity. 

But this was too blunt and it backfired, bringing to the fore the more subtle marginalization of Canadian intelligence work all through the film, which otherwise would have perhaps passed with little notice. The film after all establishes that the Canadian ambassador has taken the six in, even though in his fleeting screen time, he hovers about as a 'kindly concierge', as another reviewer put it.

You will see a more insidious version of this mentality in the opening few minutes of the film, sketching past US intervention in Iran—the film admits US backing of the Shah and his oppressive regime into power, human rights abuses and so on, but curiously, this part is mainly animated in the form of storyboards, mirroring those we see later of the fake film, as something near- mythical that happened in another time and world. Smart.

So, why the heck are we celebrating Affleck? The film shows him to be a blockhead who can put the camera sometimes in the right place."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":591648,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-11-21","keywords":"iran,hostage,u.s. embassy,escape,american embassy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Picture","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1537319449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186505/","name":"Bryan Cranston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209646/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184096/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006516/","name":"Chris Terrio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5410196/","name":"Tony Mendez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2646452/","name":"Joshuah Bearman"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
Vitez tame: Povratak
programme.desc:
The Dark Knight Rises: Directed by Christopher Nolan. With Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Tom Hardy, Joseph Gordon-Levitt. Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1345836/","name":"The Dark Knight Rises","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk4ODQzNDY3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODA0NTM4Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1345836/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Joaquin_Collete"},"dateCreated":"2012-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stunning Conclusion to an Epic Trilogy","reviewBody":"Not being a huge fan of superhero movies, I didn't have much expectations for Batman Begins. However viewing the 2005 Christopher Nolan production, I was pleasantly shocked. Then after my huge expectations for, "The Dark Knight", Christopher Nolan blew my expectations to the dust. Will the same happen with the 3rd and last film, "The Dark Knight Rises"? Quite simply, Yes! My big expectations were once again, blown away. What a production! This is a true cinematic experience, to behold. The movie exceeded my expectations in terms of action, and entertainment. The editing, sound, score, visuals, direction and action are all top notch. 

The film contains a fine cast of talented actors. Christian Bale, of course still makes is a great Batman. Michael Cain is fantastic, as he always is. He gives such a powerful performance, he really ought to be considered for an Oscar nomination. Tom Hardy as Bane is utterly terrifying, at times, and completely ominous. Anne Hathaway as Catwoman/Selina Kyle is a scene stealer. She is completely engrossing. Everyone is so great, the dynamic scenes between the actors are so well done, so well written, and so well directed. The Dark Knight Rises is is emotionally riveting and amazing to view.

At a running time of almost 3 hours, the film never becomes dull, which is pretty impressive. The movie's action sequences are spectacularly well created and very intense. The dialogue between the character's are intelligent and highly believable. The movie's soundtrack is terrific and really exemplify's many of the movie's scenes. Extremely well editing and sound use really develop many of the movie's action scenes, so it's not just explosions and visuals like in many other movies. Nolan creates a grand, dirty, engrossing world, and his action sequences just hum. 

In conclusion, this film is a gorgeous reminder that great writing and direction can enhance any movie-going experience, even superhero movies, which are usually thought of as mindless entertainment. I am wholly satisfied with Christopher Nolan's vision and thank all who worked on this film for bringing such an intricate interpretation of its very famous literary source. I cannot recommend this film anymore than I have, I just have to say everyone and anyone should see it. 10/10"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1585222,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime"],"datePublished":"2012-08-15","keywords":"dc comics,batman character,bruce wayne character,terrorist plot,sequel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"4K Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi144884505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGIwYmIwNWYtNzkxZC00YTdmLWI2NmMtYzA0ODZkNTNlZWMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGIwYmIwNWYtNzkxZC00YTdmLWI2NmMtYzA0ODZkNTNlZWMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0362766/","name":"Tom Hardy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0634240/","name":"Christopher Nolan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0634300/","name":"Jonathan Nolan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0634240/","name":"Christopher Nolan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275286/","name":"David S. Goyer"}],"duration":"PT2H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
Vrag nosi Pradu
programme.desc: The Devil Wears Prada: Directed by David Frankel. With Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, Emily Blunt, Stanley Tucci. A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0458352/","name":"The Devil Wears Prada","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ3ZTIzOTItMGNjNC00MWRmLWJlMGEtMjJmMDM5ZDIzZGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkzODUwNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458352/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"borromeot"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Meryl Streep, A Character Actress As Star","reviewBody":"Unmissable for Meryl Streep fans. She plays second fiddle to Anne Hathaway here - screen time wise, otherwise she's the whole bloody orchestra. She's the one reason to see the film and that in itself is one hell of a reason. Meryl Streep is fearless and part of the joy of going to see her films is that we know for a fact that she's going to dare and dare and dare. From Sophie's Choice and A Cry in The Dark to Death Becomes Her and Plenty. Here the story is as unbearable as most TV commercials but she, Meryl/Miranda transforms it into something else. We connect with her evil queen because her evil queen is much more real, much more human than anybody else on the screen. Emily Blunt and Stanley Tucci are fun but they're in the periphery of a story that's so wafer thing they can't really move to the center. Anne Hathaway is kind of invisible and her character only changes costumes and make up. There is no real tangible growth. Now that I got that out of my system. Go see Meryl be Miranda. You'll have a lot of fun.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":391729,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-11-15","keywords":"magazine,fashion,fashion industry,chick flick,work","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Devil Wears Prada","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1425080601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NjEzNGUtZWRkMy00OTE4LTk2OTktYjI2ODM3NDYwMWI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NjEzNGUtZWRkMy00OTE4LTk2OTktYjI2ODM3NDYwMWI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004978/","name":"Adrian Grenier"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0291205/","name":"David Frankel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174373/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174362/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112459/","name":"Aline Brosh McKenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1916979/","name":"Lauren Weisberger"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Rachel strpljivo čeka Rossa na aerodromu ne znajući da se on vraća iz Kine s novom djevojkom Julie. Phoebe grozno ošiša Monicu. Rachel strpljivo čeka Rossa na aerodromu ne znajući da se on vraća iz Kine s novom djevojkom Julie. Phoebe grozno ošiša Monicu.

programme.title: Quantum of Solace
Zrno utjehe
programme.desc:
Quantum of Solace: Directed by Marc Forster. With Daniel Craig, Olga Kurylenko, Mathieu Amalric, Judi Dench. James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0830515/","name":"Quantum of Solace","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZiYTUzMzktZWI5Yy00Mzk4LWFlMDgtYjRmNWU0Mzc0MzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUzOTY1NTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0830515/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"murtaza_mma"},"dateCreated":"2008-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Potpourri of Vestiges: The Quantum that lacked Solace","reviewBody":"Quantum of Solace or Quantum so less, as some of its critics may call it, definitely lacks certain aspects of a traditional Bond movie. It may be eccentric in the sense that it may not be able to titillate the esoteric Bond fans as it may lack their eclectic style and taste but it definitely succeeds in projecting a new Bond for the contemporary world who may not be a coeval of a superhero, who despite being vulnerable has got the killer instinct in him, which is the very defining characteristic of Ian Fleming's larger than life human incarnate. This Bond goes about his business in a fashion which is far more realistic compared to the Bond of the bygone era with an incredible passion and utmost devotion which is nothing but inexorable. Though Casino Royale was the pioneer of this graduation but its Quantum of Solace that consummates it and gives Fleming's agent a mystique which has always eluded him hitherto, an aura which gives him an opportunity to be mortal and hence a chance to qualify to be called a human.

Quantum of Solace is loaded with mind blowing action sequences which makes it a high octane extravaganza. The pace of the movie is such that you hardly get time to breathe freely. The plot though comparatively weaker than its precursor, is still good enough to keep one guessing thereby keeping one at the edge of the seat, all the way through. 

The only aspect of the movie which should be under the scanner is its editing which is far from just and at times needless and severely annoying. A bit constraint editing under some meticulous vigilance could have done wonders and would have probably helped it, in its quest to be the best Bond movie of all time. 

All being said and given what we have, the movie fails to disappoint the audience and will surely redefine the very prerequisites of an action movie and will definitely serve as a benchmark for the movies in the years to come.

http://www.apotpourriofvestiges.com/","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":425390,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2008-11-05","keywords":"attempted rape,official james bond series,official bond film,opera,water rights","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Quantum of Solace: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1024524313","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzkxNzc5NTc0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTYxNjYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzkxNzc5NTc0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTYxNjYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the second theatrical trailer for Quantum of Solace, directed by Marc Forster."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0185819/","name":"Daniel Craig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1385871/","name":"Olga Kurylenko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0023832/","name":"Mathieu Amalric"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0286975/","name":"Marc Forster"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054040/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0353673/","name":"Paul Haggis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701031/","name":"Neal Purvis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905498/","name":"Robert Wade"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
American Beauty: Directed by Sam Mendes. With Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Wes Bentley. A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0169547/","name":"American Beauty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTBmZWJkNjctNDhiNC00MGE2LWEwOTctZTk5OGVhMWMyNmVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0169547/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"reesew18"},"dateCreated":"2001-07-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"a very well done film that continues to amaze me...","reviewBody":"When I first saw this movie in theaters, I found it to be very funny. When I rented it at home, I found it to be very sad and complex. Looking at it now, I realize that it is surely one of the most extraordinary films ever to come out of Hollywood. To some it may look trite or cliched, or maybe too un-ordinary to be worthy of its praise, but the overall impact of this film is extremely powerful. After you've seen it, you know you've seen something.

A few notable elements stand out. The direction is superb; this is visually a superior film, for the director understands the subtle changes in tone. The writing is equally compelling; the story effortlessly interweaves multiple stories to create one amazing movie. The haunting music is also notable. Lastly is the acting. Kevin Spacey has done excellent films before, and he can add this one to the list. He may be a little to witty to suggest the overshadowed character he portrays, but he simply disappears into the role. Annette Bening is also fine; a less strong role, but she is magnificent none the less. As the teenagers, Thora Birch is able to mesmerize us with one intense look; her "typical teenager" role is fleshed out completely. I enjoyed Mena Suvari's character equally. It seemed that she did not receive as much acclaim, but her performance evokes both innocence and experience, and her scenes toward the end give her a depth unlike any other character. And Wes Bentley, as the video-taping boy next door, is easily the most original character. At first he seems a little tense, but, like Spacey, he sinks into the role. His "purpose" in the film, unlike anyone else's, is a mystery, thus making him the most enigmatic person.

Most films are able to make a lasting impression on its audience, but never has a movie been known to "move" its viewers as much as this movie. It truly says something about life, no matter how predictable or tacky it appears, this film disturbingly shows us how to appreciate our individual lives, so therefore, when they are over, we each have something to remember.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1106788,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"1999-10-01","keywords":"midlife crisis,adulterous wife,cheating wife,unfaithful wife,virgin girl","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi788506137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5NDcyNTgzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMwNzU0NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5NDcyNTgzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMwNzU0NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation for his daughter's attractive friend. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000228/","name":"Kevin Spacey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000906/","name":"Annette Bening"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000301/","name":"Thora Birch"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005222/","name":"Sam Mendes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021095/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

When I rented it at home, I found it to be very sad and complex. Looking at it now, I realize that it is surely one of the most extraordinary films ever to come out of Hollywood. To some it may look trite or cliched, or maybe too un-ordinary to be worthy of its praise, but the overall impact of this film is extremely powerful. After you've seen it, you know you've seen something.

A few notable elements stand out. The direction is superb; this is visually a superior film, for the director understands the subtle changes in tone. The writing is equally compelling; the story effortlessly interweaves multiple stories to create one amazing movie. The haunting music is also notable. Lastly is the acting. Kevin Spacey has done excellent films before, and he can add this one to the list. He may be a little to witty to suggest the overshadowed character he portrays, but he simply disappears into the role. Annette Bening is also fine; a less strong role, but she is magnificent none the less. As the teenagers, Thora Birch is able to mesmerize us with one intense look; her "typical teenager" role is fleshed out completely. I enjoyed Mena Suvari's character equally. And Wes Bentley, as the video-taping boy next door, is easily the most original character. At first he seems a little tense, but, like Spacey, he sinks into the role. His "purpose" in the film, unlike anyone else's, is a mystery, thus making him the most enigmatic person.

Most films are able to make a lasting impression on its audience, but never has a movie been known to "move" its viewers as much as this movie. It truly says something about life, no matter how predictable or tacky it appears, this film disturbingly shows us how to appreciate our individual lives, so therefore, when they are over, we each have something to remember.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1106788,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"1999-10-01","keywords":"midlife crisis,adulterous wife,cheating wife,unfaithful wife,virgin girl","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi788506137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5NDcyNTgzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMwNzU0NzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5NDcyNTgzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMwNzU0NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation for his daughter's attractive friend.
