programme.title: The New Mutants
Novi mutanti
programme.desc:
The New Mutants: Directed by Josh Boone. With Maisie Williams, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Heaton, Alice Braga. Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4682266/","name":"The New Mutants","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQ2NTdmNDgtMGIwMS00ODE2LTk5M2EtZGZhYzc4MWRlNTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc4MjczMTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4682266/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"user-46-247014"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bad Writing","reviewBody":"No amount of acting and effects can make up for terrible writing. Lets just say they set up certain things in the movie and then never use them. You're like, oh the beginning of the movie said this, but don't expect anything to happen because... bad writing.

It really peaks near the beginning, then really drags on. Theres a fight scene near the end that is endless, unbelievable, really repetitive. The climax is anticlimactic so....

There was potential for a good movie, and the actors did fine, but the characters didn't act like real people. It was so obvious what was going on but they dragged on every single story element and repeated it. I feel bad for these actors; Truly a waste of money and talent.

Part of the reason it was so bad is because it has an intellectual level of Spy Kids, super predictable and stereotypical moments but placed and set up so poorly that they have no emotional depth. It checks all the boxes except being interesting and having a good plot... you know... like missing the whole point of movies.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":67203,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2020-08-28","keywords":"mutant,based on comic book,marvel comics,x men,superheroine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Comic-Con Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1041219097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Twentieth Century Studios in association with Marvel Entertainment presents The New Mutants, an original horror thriller set in an isolated hospital where a group of young mutants is being held for psychiatric monitoring. When strange occurrences begin to take place, both their new mutant abilities and their friendships will be tested as they battle to try and make it out alive. Directed by Josh Boone (The Fault in our Stars) and written by Josh Boone & Knate Lee, The New Mutants stars: Maisie Williams (Game of Thrones); Anya Taylor-Joy (Glass); Charlie Heaton (Stranger Things); Alice Braga (Predators); Blu Hunt (The Originals); and Henry Zaga (13 Reasons Why). The film is produced by Simon Kinberg, p.g.a., Karen Rosenfelt and Lauren Shuler Donner with Stan Lee and Michele Imperato Stabile serving as executive producers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3586035/","name":"Maisie Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6390427/","name":"Charlie Heaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1029878/","name":"Knate Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

Nebesko kraljevstvo
programme.desc: Kingdom of Heaven: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Martin Hancock, Michael Sheen, Nathalie Cox, Eriq Ebouaney. Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0320661/","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODczYmE3ZDYtZjIwNC00ZTJhLThkMGUtZDcyNzkyNWMyZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyMzUy._V1_.jpg","description":"Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320661/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Pete-235"},"dateCreated":"2012-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best example of "See the Director's Cut"","reviewBody":"Many of the reviews above I agree with, but I also saw the theatrical version and was very disappointed (6 out of 10). When the Director's Cut came out it was 45 minutes longer, so you fear the worst, MORE of the same. In this case, the story line is filled out and the motivations and characters are fleshed out. Eva Green went from, "why is she in this movie" with virtually no screen time and less dialog to a major character who moves the plot, as you would hope given her billing. The opening scenes in France are greatly expanded and meaningful. The action scenes are better, but not substantially. The Director's cut should have been the official version of the movie, the theatrical cut is a poor excuse.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":276086,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-05-04","keywords":"crusader,12th century,jerusalem,templar,knights templar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2492727577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323361/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184258/","name":"William Monahan"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Quantum of Solace
Zrno utjehe
programme.desc:
Quantum of Solace: Directed by Marc Forster. With Daniel Craig, Olga Kurylenko, Mathieu Amalric, Judi Dench. James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0830515/","name":"Quantum of Solace","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZiYTUzMzktZWI5Yy00Mzk4LWFlMDgtYjRmNWU0Mzc0MzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUzOTY1NTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0830515/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"murtaza_mma"},"dateCreated":"2008-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Potpourri of Vestiges: The Quantum that lacked Solace","reviewBody":"Quantum of Solace or Quantum so less, as some of its critics may call it, definitely lacks certain aspects of a traditional Bond movie. It may be eccentric in the sense that it may not be able to titillate the esoteric Bond fans as it may lack their eclectic style and taste but it definitely succeeds in projecting a new Bond for the contemporary world who may not be a coeval of a superhero, who despite being vulnerable has got the killer instinct in him, which is the very defining characteristic of Ian Fleming's larger than life human incarnate. This Bond goes about his business in a fashion which is far more realistic compared to the Bond of the bygone era with an incredible passion and utmost devotion which is nothing but inexorable. Though Casino Royale was the pioneer of this graduation but its Quantum of Solace that consummates it and gives Fleming's agent a mystique which has always eluded him hitherto, an aura which gives him an opportunity to be mortal and hence a chance to qualify to be called a human.

Quantum of Solace is loaded with mind blowing action sequences which makes it a high octane extravaganza. The pace of the movie is such that you hardly get time to breathe freely. The plot though comparatively weaker than its precursor, is still good enough to keep one guessing thereby keeping one at the edge of the seat, all the way through. 

The only aspect of the movie which should be under the scanner is its editing which is far from just and at times needless and severely annoying. A bit constraint editing under some meticulous vigilance could have done wonders and would have probably helped it, in its quest to be the best Bond movie of all time. 

All being said and given what we have, the movie fails to disappoint the audience and will surely redefine the very prerequisites of an action movie and will definitely serve as a benchmark for the movies in the years to come.

programme.title: American Beauty
Vrtlog života
programme.desc:
American Beauty: Directed by Sam Mendes. With Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Wes Bentley. A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0169547/","name":"American Beauty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTBmZWJkNjctNDhiNC00MGE2LWEwOTctZTk5OGVhMWMyNmVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0169547/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"reesew18"},"dateCreated":"2001-07-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"a very well done film that continues to amaze me...","reviewBody":"When I first saw this movie in theaters, I found it to be very funny. When I rented it at home, I found it to be very sad and complex. Looking at it now, I realize that it is surely one of the most extraordinary films ever to come out of Hollywood. To some it may look trite or cliched, or maybe too un-ordinary to be worthy of its praise, but the overall impact of this film is extremely powerful. After you've seen it, you know you've seen something.

A few notable elements stand out. The direction is superb; this is visually a superior film, for the director understands the subtle changes in tone. The writing is equally compelling; the story effortlessly interweaves multiple stories to create one amazing movie. The haunting music is also notable. Lastly is the acting. Kevin Spacey has done excellent films before, and he can add this one to the list. He may be a little to witty to suggest the overshadowed character he portrays, but he simply disappears into the role. Annette Bening is also fine; a less strong role, but she is magnificent none the less. As the teenagers, Thora Birch is able to mesmerize us with one intense look; her "typical teenager" role is fleshed out completely. I enjoyed Mena Suvari's character equally. It seemed that she did not receive as much acclaim, but her performance evokes both innocence and experience, and her scenes toward the end give her a depth unlike any other character. And Wes Bentley, as the video-taping boy next door, is easily the most original character. At first he seems a little tense, but, like Spacey, he sinks into the role. His "purpose" in the film, unlike anyone else's, is a mystery, thus making him the most enigmatic person.

Most films are able to make a lasting impression on its audience, but never has a movie been known to "move" its viewers as much as this movie. It truly says something about life, no matter how predictable or tacky it appears, this film disturbingly shows us how to appreciate our individual lives, so therefore, when they are over, we each have something to remember.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1106788,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"1999-10-01","keywords":"midlife crisis,adulterous wife,cheating wife,unfaithful wife,virgin girl","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi788506137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5NDcyNTgzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMwNzU0NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5NDcyNTgzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMwNzU0NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation for his daughter's attractive friend. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000228/","name":"Kevin Spacey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000906/","name":"Annette Bening"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000301/","name":"Thora Birch"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005222/","name":"Sam Mendes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021095/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0320661/","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODczYmE3ZDYtZjIwNC00ZTJhLThkMGUtZDcyNzkyNWMyZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyMzUy._V1_.jpg","description":"Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320661/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Pete-235"},"dateCreated":"2012-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best example of "See the Director's Cut"","reviewBody":"Many of the reviews above I agree with, but I also saw the theatrical version and was very disappointed (6 out of 10). When the Director's Cut came out it was 45 minutes longer, so you fear the worst, MORE of the same. In this case, the story line is filled out and the motivations and characters are fleshed out. Eva Green went from, "why is she in this movie" with virtually no screen time and less dialog to a major character who moves the plot, as you would hope given her billing. The opening scenes in France are greatly expanded and meaningful. The action scenes are better, but not substantially. The Director's cut should have been the official version of the movie, the theatrical cut is a poor excuse.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":276086,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-05-04","keywords":"crusader,12th century,jerusalem,templar,knights templar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2492727577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323361/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184258/","name":"William Monahan"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Skyfall
Skyfall
programme.desc:
Skyfall: Directed by Sam Mendes. With Daniel Craig, Judi Dench, Javier Bardem, Ralph Fiennes. James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1074638/","name":"Skyfall","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWZiNjE2OWItMTkwNy00ZWQzLWI0NTgtMWE0NjNiYTljN2Q1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzAwMjYxMzA@._V1_.jpg","description":"James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1074638/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"didrikwessel"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"I'm having a hard time expressing myself when it comes to this movie. It was a great movie all in all, but I feel like there's something missing. 

Javier Bardem played the villain fantastically, the way he spoke and acted gave you chills and made you believe that there was something beneath his facade. (I don't think it's worth mentioning that Daniel Craigs acting was good, that has already been acknowledged).

After almost two hours in, I felt that I had so many questions unanswered and I started to worry how the movie was going to answer all of them in just half an hour. But I wasn't disappointed. Yet I was still hoping for something more, in a way.

There was just bits missing that would have made the film so much more better (even though it was great). For example getting to know more about Raoul Silvas life would have given him a stronger role in the movie. But I believe that the thing that i was the most disappointed about was Q. Bringing the character back after a few years sure brings peoples hopes up. And I was really expecting the cool gadgets that we've seen in the earlier movies. It was always fantastic to see the awesome stuff that a 007 got access to that made the spy life seem so cool. But in this movie I feel like they under-did his role a bit. A gun responding to fingerprints is cool, but the last time we saw Q, Bond got an invisible car with rocket launchers and a ring that could break glass. Sure they try to make the movies more realistic today, but I still feel that giving him a bigger role would have brought the movie up a bit.

Although I don't want to complain to much. The movie was great, go see it, you will like it and its a bit darker side than the previous films.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":659362,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-10-26","keywords":"007,death of major character,official bond film,official james bond series,childhood home","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi973841433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzODUxMTY3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0OTI2OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzODUxMTY3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0OTI2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bond's loyalty to M is tested as her past comes back to haunt her. As MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0185819/","name":"Daniel Craig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000849/","name":"Javier Bardem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0365140/","name":"Naomie Harris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005222/","name":"Sam Mendes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701031/","name":"Neal Purvis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905498/","name":"Robert Wade"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517589/","name":"John Logan"}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
Danova prava ljubav
programme.desc:
Dan in Real Life: Directed by Peter Hedges. With Steve Carell, Juliette Binoche, Dane Cook, Alison Pill. A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0480242/","name":"Dan in Real Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2Nzc1NzQ1OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTE0MDE1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0480242/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ferguson-6"},"dateCreated":"2007-10-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Carrying the Torch","reviewBody":"Greetings again from the darkness. Director Peter Hedges' best work is "Pieces of April", a very edgy family drama/comedy that I have recommended to many. Although "Dan in Real Life" doesn't possess anywhere near the edginess of that film, it is an entertaining film with some clever moments ... though it is much more mainstream (by design).

Steve Carell stars as Dan, a widower father of three daughters. Just in case you have forgotten, the movie does remind you just how wicked teenage girls can be ... even the good ones. The film centers around the annual family reunion at the parents' (Dianne Weist, John Mahoney) beautiful summer house in Rhode Island. Although the film borrows material from many large family comdrams, there are a handful of moments and lines that prevent it from being a total remix. Odd casting does help.

Dane Cook and Emily Blunt have supporting roles that are both very well done. Personally I find it difficult to ever really like Dane Cook, but he controls his freak pretty well here. Ms. Blunt is a budding star (see "The Devil Wears Prada") and sooner or later, Hollywood will find the right roles to showcase her talents. By far the most outside the box casting occurs with Juliette Binoche in the pivotal role of Marie. Not to give too much away, but she does give new meaning to brotherly love.

Carell is fine and at least isn't falling into the one-trick pony career of Ben Stiller. He does have some range as an actor and hopefully will mix in a few dramas with the slapstick. Wouldn't call this anything close to a classic, but it is a movie families (not the youngsters) can watch together and be entertained ... nothing wrong with that.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":100179,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-10-26","keywords":"teenage girl,game,young girl,gymnasium,new york city","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dan in Real Life","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi414318873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDExMTA1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzA4ODM4._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDExMTA1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzA4ODM4._V1_.jpg","description":"Dan in Real Life trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136797/","name":"Steve Carell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000300/","name":"Juliette Binoche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176981/","name":"Dane Cook"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373282/","name":"Peter Hedges"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0168855/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307070/","name":"Pierce Gardner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373282/","name":"Peter Hedges"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mayans M.C

programme.desc:

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
Ljetno kino 300: Uspon carstva
programme.desc: 300: Rise of an Empire: Directed by Noam Murro. With Sullivan Stapleton, Eva Green, Lena Headey, Hans Matheson. Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1253863/","name":"300: Rise of an Empire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEwNTU2MjAwMDdeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDk2Njc2Njk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1253863/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MR_Heraclius"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"300","reviewBody":"Is it a 300 prequel, sequel, or set concurrently with the events of 300? Yes. It somehow manages to be all of the above, and manages to come up with a story that leads up to the events of the original and sorta what happens afterwards as well as creating a storyline of what was happening at the same time somewhere else. programme.title: Skyfall
Skyfall
programme.desc:
Skyfall: Directed by Sam Mendes. With Daniel Craig, Judi Dench, Javier Bardem, Ralph Fiennes. James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1074638/","name":"Skyfall","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWZiNjE2OWItMTkwNy00ZWQzLWI0NTgtMWE0NjNiYTljN2Q1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzAwMjYxMzA@._V1_.jpg","description":"James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1074638/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"didrikwessel"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"I'm having a hard time expressing myself when it comes to this movie. It was a great movie all in all, but I feel like there's something missing. 

Javier Bardem played the villain fantastically, the way he spoke and acted gave you chills and made you believe that there was something beneath his facade. (I don't think it's worth mentioning that Daniel Craigs acting was good, that has already been acknowledged).

After almost two hours in, I felt that I had so many questions unanswered and I started to worry how the movie was going to answer all of them in just half an hour. But I wasn't disappointed. Yet I was still hoping for something more, in a way.

There was just bits missing that would have made the film so much more better (even though it was great). For example getting to know more about Raoul Silvas life would have given him a stronger role in the movie. But I believe that the thing that i was the most disappointed about was Q. Bringing the character back after a few years sure brings peoples hopes up. And I was really expecting the cool gadgets that we've seen in the earlier movies. It was always fantastic to see the awesome stuff that a 007 got access to that made the spy life seem so cool. But in this movie I feel like they under-did his role a bit. A gun responding to fingerprints is cool, but the last time we saw Q, Bond got an invisible car with rocket launchers and a ring that could break glass. Sure they try to make the movies more realistic today, but I still feel that giving him a bigger role would have brought the movie up a bit.

Although I don't want to complain to much. The movie was great, go see it, you will like it and its a bit darker side than the previous films.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":659362,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-10-26","keywords":"007,death of major character,official bond film,official james bond series,childhood home","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi973841433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzODUxMTY3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0OTI2OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzODUxMTY3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0OTI2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bond's loyalty to M is tested as her past comes back to haunt her. As MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0185819/","name":"Daniel Craig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000849/","name":"Javier Bardem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0365140/","name":"Naomie Harris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005222/","name":"Sam Mendes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701031/","name":"Neal Purvis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905498/","name":"Robert Wade"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517589/","name":"John Logan"}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nesigurna
programme.desc: Humoristična serija, koju je osmislila i u kojoj glumi Issa Rae, govori o prijateljstvu dviju modernih crnkinja, kao i o svim njihovim neugodnim iskustvima i provokativnim nevoljama. Humoristična serija, koju je osmislila i u kojoj glumi Issa Rae, govori o prijateljstvu dviju modernih crnkinja, kao i o svim njihovim neugodnim iskustvima i provokativnim nevoljama. Dok se snalaze na nezgodnom profesionalnom i osobnom terenu Los Angelesa, najbolje prijateljice Issa (Rae) i Molly (Yvonne Orji) suočavaju se s izazovima crnkinja koje prkose svim stereotipima. Peta sezona prati naše omiljene likove dok procjenjuju svoje odnose, nove i stare, u nastojanju da shvate tko i što dolazi s njima u paketu u ovoj sljedećoj fazi njihova života.

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
Bez oduševljenja, molim!
programme.desc: Curb Your Enthusiasm: Created by Larry David. With Larry David, Jeff Garlin, Cheryl Hines, Susie Essman. The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0264235/","name":"Curb Your Enthusiasm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE3ZDA4OWItOGY2ZC00MzVmLTk0Y2QtNzEzMjc5YWI5ZWFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0264235/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MovieMarauder"},"dateCreated":"2002-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Some People Just Aren't Getting It...","reviewBody":"I think too many people are looking to this show as a Seinfeld spin-off. The truth is, it's not, and you have to take the show for what it truly is. Larry David, in his great comedic brilliance, is not trying to glorify himself with this show, you can tell that just from watching one episode. Instead, he is really utilizing a caricature of a rich, whipped, neurotic yuppie to skewer the image of life at the top. His character (even though he is essentially playing himself), bumbles, complains, talks himself into painful situations, and is ultimately served devilishly funny comeuppance from episode to episode. This self-deprecating humor wouldn't work for anybody else, but for a guy like Larry David, this material works perfectly, because he seems so easy to laugh at (and I have a feeling this is hardly accidental, which is why his comedy is truly brilliant.) I really have to marvel at the idea of anyone NOT being able to laugh at this show. It's the greatest comedic take on life and the human condition that has ever been captured on film. All other television comedies of this era pale in comparison. "Curb Your Enthusiasm" is possibly the salvation of true comedy TV, in an age when good television comedies are few and far between."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":111061,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2000-10-15","keywords":"actor playing himself,misperception,misconception,misunderstanding,husband wife relationship","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0202970/","name":"Larry David"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0385644/","name":"Cheryl Hines"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307531/","name":"Jeff Garlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137915/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0202970/","name":"Larry David"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 11 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3919430425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBjY2Y0MzYtZjgyZS00NGUyLWIwOTItNmMxNWM0M2Y1MzQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBjY2Y0MzYtZjgyZS00NGUyLWIwOTItNmMxNWM0M2Y1MzQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rocky V
Roki 5
programme.desc:
Rocky V: Directed by John G. Avildsen. With Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Sage Stallone. Reluctantly retired from fighting, Rocky takes charge of Mickey's gym and agrees to train a young protégé who's hungry for success." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100507/","name":"Rocky V","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2Mzc4MTYxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODY5NTk1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Reluctantly retired from fighting, Rocky takes charge of Mickey's gym and agrees to train a young protégé who's hungry for success.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100507/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Margaux1"},"dateCreated":"2003-06-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"A wonderful movie about father and son","reviewBody":"Sometimes it gets annoying to me how critical people are of the Rocky series. It's like they feel like they have to say terrible things about it, probably because people can be so negative that they can't find it in themselves to believe that a 'less than intelligent' person with heart, drive and passion can move mountains and achieve success. 

 I personally thought this, and every other Rocky movie, was fabulous. I thought Sage Stallone was amazing in his debut as Rocky's son. Also, this movie showed a more real side of boxing, the business side, with exploitative agents and corrupt business tactics. 

Some may think the Rocky series is an unrealistic saga, but Rocky IV proves it isn't. The person we saw struggle, fight, and grow rich is now back to square one...minus all the money but still with the heart.

I saw this movie and it brought tears to my eyes. It shows how wrapped up we can become when trying to achieve our goals through others and how it affects people around us.

IMDb data; ttnr: 0100507, Title: Rocky V, --- Description: Rocky V: Directed by John G. Avildsen. With Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Sage Stallone. Reluctantly retired from fighting, Rocky takes charge of Mickey's gym and agrees to train a young protégé who's hungry for success." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100507/","name":"Rocky V","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2Mzc4MTYxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODY5NTk1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Reluctantly retired from fighting, Rocky takes charge of Mickey's gym and agrees to train a young protégé who's hungry for success.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100507/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Margaux1","dateCreated":"2003-06-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"A wonderful movie about father and son","reviewBody":"Sometimes it gets annoying to me how critical people are of the Rocky series. It's like they feel like they have to say terrible things about it, probably because people can be so negative that they can't find it in themselves to believe that a 'less than intelligent' person with heart, drive and passion can move mountains and achieve success. 

 I personally thought this, and every other Rocky movie, was fabulous. I thought Sage Stallone was amazing in his debut as Rocky's son. Also, this movie showed a more real side of boxing, the business side, with exploitative agents and corrupt business tactics. 

Some may think the Rocky series is an unrealistic saga, but Rocky IV proves it isn't. The person we saw struggle, fight, and grow rich is now back to square one...minus all the money but still with the heart.

I saw this movie and it brought tears to my eyes. It shows how wrapped up we can become when trying to achieve our goals through others and how it affects people around us. 

I thought it was an interesting storyline and was a lot better than people give it credit for.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":132107,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"1990-11-16","keywords":"rocky balboa jr character,rocky balboa character,adrian character,paulie character,mickey goldmill character","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001735/","name":"Talia Shire","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0949350/","name":"Burt Young"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000814/","name":"John G. programme.desc: Suočena s novinarskom patkom o nesuglasicama između potpredsjednice i prve dame, Selina suzbija optužbe da je za sve kriva ona - iako jest. Suočena s novinarskom patkom o nesuglasicama između potpredsjednice i prve dame, Selina suzbija optužbe da je za sve kriva ona - iako jest. Gary odabere kandidate za potpredsjedničina psa, ali će Selinina kći Catherine, koja je došla s faksa u posjet, imati zadnju riječ.

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
Ta luda ljubav
programme.desc: Crazy, Stupid, Love.: Directed by Glenn Ficarra, John Requa. With Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling, Julianne Moore, Emma Stone. A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1570728/","name":"Crazy, Stupid, Love.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2MjkwMTM0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzc4NDg2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1570728/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"IronBallsM"},"dateCreated":"2011-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"I enjoyed everything about this movie.","reviewBody":"My initial reaction is that this film is the best romantic comedy that I've seen in years. The genre has been pretty devoid of quality lately. So, I don't know if that plays a part or not and I really don't care at this point. I enjoyed everything about this movie. It has tremendous heart and charisma and it's so very easy to get caught up in to the lives of these characters. A certain degree of patience is required while viewing because some secondary characters that feel unnecessary to the story are worth getting to know. Steve Carell's character is the one everyone empathizes with and when the movie shifts away from the "A" story you wonder why and start to think that the "B" story is going to be muddled or cliché or one to endure. Well, they're not and everything comes together in a wonderful fashion. The entire cast here is perfection. The overall message may be one to debate but it doesn't matter because the ride and this film are just so smart and so well done."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":493113,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-07-29","keywords":"divorce,marriage,unfaithfulness,adultery,marital problem","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crazy, Stupid, Love.","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3722091801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MTY2NzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzYzNDg4NA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MTY2NzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzYzNDg4NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Newly single Cal Weaver (Steve Carell) is taken on as wingman and protÃ©gÃ© to handsome, thirtysomething player Jacob Palmer (Ryan Gosling). Despite a makeover and many new conquests, the one thing that canÂ’t be made over is his love for his wife (Julianne), who cheated on him and thinks she wants a divorce."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136797/","name":"Steve Carell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331516/","name":"Ryan Gosling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275629/","name":"Glenn Ficarra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720135/","name":"John Requa"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0259041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dystopia
Crno jezero: Distopija
programme.desc:
Dystopia: With Lola Zackow, Madeleine Martin, Johan Hafezi, Erik Bolin. Group of Swedes, get into an abandoned factory deep in the wilderness for a live roleplay to push their physical and mental limits. Game turns dead serious when series of mysteries unfold, awakening dark forces in each of them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt14111834/","name":"Dystopia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzM3NDZhZmEtZjY3NS00NGIxLTg1NWMtNmRjZjQ4NDk2YTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzY0MTE3NzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Group of Swedes, get into an abandoned factory deep in the wilderness for a live roleplay to push their physical and mental limits. Game turns dead serious when series of mysteries unfold, awakening dark forces in each of them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt14111834/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"xtiaan-242-723824"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Might have worked as a film","reviewBody":"The premise is so thin. A group of people in an abandoned steel mill (it doesnt even look like a steel mill, it looks interesting, but steel wasnt produced on that site) setting it up for a live role playing game, then spooky things start to happen.

The plot is full of holes (if you had an abandoned secret research facility why would you rent it out to a bunch of inquisitive LARPERS?), the science is equally unlikely (transferring "souls") All the characters are completely unlikeable, they are either using each other, or sleeping with each other, or ignoring bad things that are happening, there is quite literally nobody to root for.

The one character I did like, because he was handsome and had a jersey I would like to own (yes, reasons to like characters in this series are just. That. Tenuous...) ends up dead.

It may have worked as a film, but theres just not enough matrerial here for a series, if you edited the whole thing down to an hour and a half it would still be an mediocre "ok one of those" films you watch on a friday night when you cant be bothered going out and dont want to think too much..","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2266,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2021-06-13","keywords":"lesbian kiss,lesbian sex,topless female nudity,larp,larpers","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11198177/","name":"Lola Zackow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4477198/","name":"Madeleine Martin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7154476/","name":"Johan Hafezi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004517/"}]}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Britanija
programme.desc: Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Nemilosrdni i lukavi general Aulo Plaucije odlučniji je no ikad da osvoji ovu mitsku zemlju na krajnjem rubu Rimskog Carstva. Sada je slomio i razbio moćne druide, ali njegova prava misija da zarobi i ubije Odabranu ostaje nedostižna. Uz snage koje se okupljaju protiv nje, Cait je ranjivija nego što misli. Skrhana događajima u drugoj sezoni, bori se sa svojim putom Odabrane - no možete li ikada zaista pobjeći od svoje sudbine?

programme.title: The White Lotus

The vacationers include the Mossbacher family - Nicole (Connie Britton), a successful type-A exec, who can't help but treat her family like disobedient employees; her husband, Mark (Steve Zahn), dealing with both an embarrassing health crisis and a terminal inferiority complex; their teenaged son, Quinn (Fred Hechinger), a socially awkward gamer, experiencing the wonder of nature for the very first time; their daughter, Olivia (Sydney Sweeney), and her friend, Paula (Brittany O'Grady), sharp-tongued college sophomores who cast a sardonic eye on the lifestyles and belief systems of everyone around them. The handsome, entitled Shane Patton (Jake Lacy) is here with his beautiful bride, Rachel (Alexandra Daddario). Shane and Rachel are in the throes of young love, but as they get to know each other better in this new, intimate environment, clouds of doubt appear - and by the time Shane's intrusive mother, Kitty (Molly Shannon) surprises them with an unwelcome visit, their fairytale honeymoon has begun to unravel. And finally, there is Tanya McQuoid (Jennifer Coolidge), a wealthy, unstable woman, recovering from the death of her mother, traveling alone to the hotel, looking for love and in desperate need of a massage."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hollywood: Na snimanju
programme.desc: Hollywood: Na snimanju" donosi ekskluzivni materijal sa setova najnovijih filmova. Hollywood: Na snimanju" donosi ekskluzivni materijal sa setova najnovijih filmova. Svaka epizoda predstavlja tri nova buduća kinohita čije se premijere tek očekuju i donosi informacije o tome tko ih je i kako snimio!

programme.title: Britanija
programme.desc: Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Nemilosrdni i lukavi general Aulo Plaucije odlučniji je no ikad da osvoji ovu mitsku zemlju na krajnjem rubu Rimskog Carstva. Sada je slomio i razbio moćne druide, ali njegova prava misija da zarobi i ubije Odabranu ostaje nedostižna. Uz snage koje se okupljaju protiv nje, Cait je ranjivija nego što misli. Skrhana događajima u drugoj sezoni, bori se sa svojim putom Odabrane - no možete li ikada zaista pobjeći od svoje sudbine?

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
Roki Balboa
programme.desc: Rocky Balboa: Directed by Sylvester Stallone. With Sylvester Stallone, Burt Young, Antonio Tarver, Geraldine Hughes. Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0479143/","name":"Rocky Balboa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIyNmQyNjctYmVmMS00MGI4LWIxMmUtNjA0ODYzOTA0Yjk0L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0479143/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"GodfatherCW"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fitting and heartwarming conclusion","reviewBody":"Sylvester Stallone completes his Rocky Epic with a stirring conclusion. I saw a special sneak preview in Detroit at a Kronk Boxing Gym benefit. Although the first 45 minutes kind of dragged, and at times the dialog made me cringe, its at least as worthy of Rocky II or the original Rocky. A lot of flashbacks, but it definitely wraps up the series a lot better than Rocky V did. It won't win best picture, or any great acting awards, but the cinematography was better than I've seen in a lot of the previous 5. As far as the big question in the blogs, does Rocky die in this one, you'll have to wait till Christmas and see for yourself. The music was great, the final scenes were great, and Paulie was great! It was also interesting to reintroduce the characters of Little Marie and Spider Rico from the first movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":210011,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2007-02-28","keywords":"retired boxer,sequel to best picture winner,computer simulation,rocky balboa character,adrian character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rocky Balboa","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3013870873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDk4ZDlhZjctZmRmMi00ZjVjLWFlODQtOGY1MjBhNDBkNDYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDk4ZDlhZjctZmRmMi00ZjVjLWFlODQtOGY1MjBhNDBkNDYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer #1, pre st, grnn band, "Christmas", lbx"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1620989/","name":"Antonio Tarver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0893257/","name":"Milo Ventimiglia"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ojai u plamenu: Naša priča o požaru
programme.desc: 4. prosinca 2017. g., dok je vjetar Santa Ana vijao okrugom Ventura opasnom brzinom, izbio je požar Thomas i spalio gotovo 115.000 hektara zemlje. U režiji stanovnika Ojaia i filmaša Michaela Milana,... 4. prosinca 2017. g., dok je vjetar Santa Ana vijao okrugom Ventura opasnom brzinom, izbio je požar Thomas i spalio gotovo 115.000 hektara zemlje. U režiji stanovnika Ojaia i filmaša Michaela Milana, ovaj kratki osobni dokumentarac sastoji se od snimaka požara i intervjua onih najteže pogođenih. Milano, koji je dokumentirao i utjecaj požara na svoju obitelj, prati stanovnike koji su pretrpjeli vatreno uništenje svojih domova i lokala, kao i napore grada u pomoći i izgradnji. Na kraju, OJAI U PLAMENU naglašava otpornost stanovnika okruga Ventura u vrijeme kad prijetnja kalifornijskih požara ne pokazuje znakove opadanja.

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
Ta luda ljubav
programme.desc: Crazy, Stupid, Love.: Directed by Glenn Ficarra, John Requa. With Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling, Julianne Moore, Emma Stone. A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1570728/","name":"Crazy, Stupid, Love.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2MjkwMTM0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzc4NDg2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1570728/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"IronBallsM"},"dateCreated":"2011-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"I enjoyed everything about this movie.","reviewBody":"My initial reaction is that this film is the best romantic comedy that I've seen in years. The genre has been pretty devoid of quality lately. So, I don't know if that plays a part or not and I really don't care at this point. I enjoyed everything about this movie. It has tremendous heart and charisma and it's so very easy to get caught up in to the lives of these characters. A certain degree of patience is required while viewing because some secondary characters that feel unnecessary to the story are worth getting to know. Steve Carell's character is the one everyone empathizes with and when the movie shifts away from the "A" story you wonder why and start to think that the "B" story is going to be muddled or cliché or one to endure. Well, they're not and everything comes together in a wonderful fashion. The entire cast here is perfection. The overall message may be one to debate but it doesn't matter because the ride and this film are just so smart and so well done."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":493113,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-07-29","keywords":"divorce,marriage,unfaithfulness,adultery,marital problem","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crazy, Stupid, Love.","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3722091801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MTY2NzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzYzNDg4NA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MTY2NzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzYzNDg4NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Newly single Cal Weaver (Steve Carell) is taken on as wingman and protÃ©gÃ© to handsome, thirtysomething player Jacob Palmer (Ryan Gosling). programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
Čudesne zvijeri i gdje ih pronaći
programme.desc:
Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Directed by David Yates. With Eddie Redmayne, Sam Redford, Scott Goldman, Tim Bentinck. The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3183660/","name":"Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxOTM1OTI4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE5OTYxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3183660/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Filvies144"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Harry Potter based film without Harry Potter? No problem.","reviewBody":"Originality is nearly non-existent in the movie industry now a days since sequels, spin-offs, prequels, and Remakes dominate. But I do usually see them because the originals are good. Checking this out in theaters for me didn't require any trailers, because its based on the Harry Potter universe. What's not to like about that?

This film is set in the same universe as Harry Potter, except in 1926, in New York. It is centered on the wizard Newt Scamander, who brings magical a suitcase containing Magical Creatures to New York, but when the creatures come loose, its up to him and his friends to get them back to avoid getting exposed to non magical people. The movie mostly has a good pace, and is fun. It also introduces interesting ideas to the universe, which really got me intrigued. However, it can be confusing, and hard to get into at first. When I watched it, it took me 10-15 minutes to understand it. But those little nitpicks don't take away the good writing this film has.

For the characters of this film, they are a pretty enjoyable cast. The main character Newt (I'm just going to be honest) is a moron. Seriously why would anyone think that bringing a suitcase of magical creatures that isn't 100% secure to a city of non magical people is a wonderful idea? However, he is a fun character with a goofy personality and if great to follow. Also joining the adventure, is the auror Tina and her sister Queenie, who are likable and contribute to the adventure. But my favorite character is Jacob, who is a no-maj(non magical person) who gets involved in the adventure and helps Newt. I liked how he has a goofy personality and is very funny. The fantastic beasts in the movie are also really funny, and cute as well. I only mentioned those because the rest of the cast involves spoilers, but the characters are overall pleasant additions to the Harry Potter universe.

The visual effects in this movie are better than shown in the other 8 Harry Potter movies. The budget is 180 million and it shows. The design of the animals are brilliant, (just to avoid the "fantastic" pun)with unique abilities, and they all stand out rather than simply having dragons. Other magic in the film is unique (like the suitcase). I like how this film used many more of these ideas to bring to life and doesn't make it stand out as much in the action scenes or use gimmicks (unlike the other Harry Potter films). So overall, brilliant visual effects to add to this film.

After the Harry Potter films, I didn't expect this spin-off to be this good, but I was wrong. The movie is overall a holiday treat with a Fun story and characters, interesting ideas, and awesome effects. It is a recommendation from me indeed, and after this, we'll see if the next spin-off coming to theaters near us, Rouge One: A Star Wars Story, can top this.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":429975,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2016-11-16","keywords":"magic,wizard,suitcase,based on novel,magical creature","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1553839641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTExOTQ2NDg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODYyOTYxMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTExOTQ2NDg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODYyOTYxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519666/","name":"Eddie Redmayne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2239702/","name":"Katherine Waterston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0837223/","name":"Alison Sudol"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0946734/","name":"David Yates"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746830/","name":"J.K. Rowling"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Potpredsjednica
programme.desc: Dan i Amy prisustvuju promociji knjige guvernera Dannyja Chunga, karizmatičnoga azijsko-američkog ratnog heroja, za kojeg Selina strahuje da bi joj mogao predstavljati političku prijetnju. Dan i Amy prisustvuju promociji knjige guvernera Dannyja Chunga, karizmatičnoga azijsko-američkog ratnog heroja, za kojeg Selina strahuje da bi joj mogao predstavljati političku prijetnju. U međuvremenu, Selina priprema Mikea za presicu izabravši američki nogomet kao temu za razgovor s "običnim ljudima", a poslije Gary i Amy otkriju da Selina ima ljubavnika.

programme.title: Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc: Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće. Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. Svaka epizoda daje Oliveru jedinstvenu platformu odakle može nuditi svoje specifično gledište o svjetskim problemima uz razne posebne goste i segmente.

programme.title: Ljubav je ljubav: Generacija Q
programme.desc: Bettina strast raspaljuje se na poslu, dok Angie prima neke velike vijesti koje kompliciraju stvari kod kuće. Bettina strast raspaljuje se na poslu, dok Angie prima neke velike vijesti koje kompliciraju stvari kod kuće. Shanein i Tessin poslovni pothvat ne ide po planu, a Alice se opire suočavanju s istinom svoje situacije s Nat. U međuvremenu, Finley, Sophie i Dani muče se da se prilagode novoj normali, a Micah se oslanja na Maribelinu potporu kad započne novi posao.

programme.desc:
Bolt: Directed by Byron Howard, Chris Williams. With John Travolta, Miley Cyrus, Susie Essman, Mark Walton. The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0397892/","name":"Bolt","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQyNDE5NjQ1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDExMTAwMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0397892/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jonconnormustlive-46298"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fun action packed Disney adventure","reviewBody":"Bolt follows a canine actor known for playing a super hero on a TV show, he is supported from his owner and must find his way back to her, all while believing he truly has super powers.

Bolt is loads of fun! There are lots of creative action scenes, plenty of funny jokes, and even some emotional scenes. Bolt has the makings of a Disney classic, but it does come up a little short of the usual Disney magic.

Firstly, the story lacks depth, the story basically tells itself in the first 30 minutes, then fuels the rest with action, comedy and drama. Secondly Miley Cyrus proved to be an annoying choice for voicing one of the main characters, not only is she an ear-sore, but she struggles to express different emotions vocally, her voice feels fake and just detracts from the overall film.

Luckily there's still plenty good in Bolt, it's definitely a great choice for a family friendly action comedy!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":199422,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2008-12-17","keywords":"dog,cat,hamster,reference to tiger beat magazine,time bomb","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bolt: Theatrical Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3253338393","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MDIwODc0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc4MDc3MQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MDIwODc0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc4MDc3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the first theatrical trailer for Bolt, directed by Byron Howard and Chris Williams."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1415323/","name":"Miley Cyrus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261435/","name":"Susie Essman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0397174/","name":"Byron Howard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0930261/","name":"Chris Williams"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074039/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0930261/","name":"Chris Williams"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dystopia
Crno jezero: Distopija
programme.desc:
Dystopia: With Lola Zackow, Madeleine Martin, Johan Hafezi, Erik Bolin. Group of Swedes, get into an abandoned factory deep in the wilderness for a live roleplay to push their physical and mental limits. Game turns dead serious when series of mysteries unfold, awakening dark forces in each of them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt14111834/","name":"Dystopia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzM3NDZhZmEtZjY3NS00NGIxLTg1NWMtNmRjZjQ4NDk2YTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzY0MTE3NzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Group of Swedes, get into an abandoned factory deep in the wilderness for a live roleplay to push their physical and mental limits. Game turns dead serious when series of mysteries unfold, awakening dark forces in each of them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt14111834/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"xtiaan-242-723824"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Might have worked as a film","reviewBody":"The premise is so thin. A group of people in an abandoned steel mill (it doesnt even look like a steel mill, it looks interesting, but steel wasnt produced on that site) setting it up for a live role playing game, then spooky things start to happen.

The plot is full of holes (if you had an abandoned secret research facility why would you rent it out to a bunch of inquisitive LARPERS?), the science is equally unlikely (transferring "souls") All the characters are completely unlikeable, they are either using each other, or sleeping with each other, or ignoring bad things that are happening, there is quite literally nobody to root for.

The one character I did like, because he was handsome and had a jersey I would like to own (yes, reasons to like characters in this series are just. That. Tenuous...) ends up dead.

It may have worked as a film, but theres just not enough matrerial here for a series, if you edited the whole thing down to an hour and a half it would still be an mediocre "ok one of those" films you watch on a friday night when you cant be bothered going out and dont want to think too much..","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2266,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2021-06-13","keywords":"lesbian kiss,lesbian sex,topless female nudity,larp,larpers","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11198177/","name":"Lola Zackow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4477198/","name":"Madeleine Martin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7154476/","name":"Johan Hafezi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004517/"}]}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Joker
Joker
programme.desc: Joker: Directed by Todd Phillips. With Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy. In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7286456/","name":"Joker","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVjNWI4ZGUtNzE0MS00YTJmLWE0ZDctN2ZiYTk2YmI3NTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7286456/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Aman_Goyal"},"dateCreated":"2019-09-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Perfect in every aspect.","reviewBody":"Truly a masterpiece, The Best Hollywood film of 2019, one of the Best films of the decade... And truly the Best film to bring a comic book so chillingly and realistically to real ife. Remarkable Direction, Cinematography, Music and the Acting. Some people are surprised to find it DISTURBING and VIOLENT, but it's a necessity and message. It's about society and reflects those underappreciated/unrecognized/bullied people, proving they can do something too. The way it shows class difference, corruption and how rich and talented rule others around them is not exaggerated and that's what makes it different. It's BELIEVABLE. There could be multiple JOKERs living in our society that could shake those around them in much bitter way than the film shows making people uncomforting people. Consider this a wake up call, a message, but first a film. A PERFECT film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1077242,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-10-04","keywords":"mental illness,laughing,evil clown,stand up comedian,nihilism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1723318041","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU0ZGVmY2MtMTM1OS00YmNlLWE1NGUtMGYyMjI1MjY1NWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU0ZGVmY2MtMTM1OS00YmNlLWE1NGUtMGYyMjI1MjY1NWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"An exploration of Arthur Fleck, a man disregarded by society."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001618/","name":"Joaquin Phoenix"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5939164/","name":"Zazie Beetz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0227121/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798788/","name":"Scott Silver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004170/","name":"Bob Kane"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7286456/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Aman_Goyal","dateCreated":"2019-09-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Perfect in every aspect.","reviewBody":"Truly a masterpiece, The Best Hollywood film of 2019, one of the Best films of the decade... And truly the Best film to bring a comic book so chillingly and realistically to real ife. Remarkable Direction, Cinematography, Music and the Acting. Some people are surprised to find it DISTURBING and VIOLENT, but it's a necessity and message. It's about society and reflects those underappreciated/unrecognized/bullied people, proving they can do something too. The way it shows class difference, corruption and how rich and talented rule others around them is not exaggerated and that's what makes it different. It's BELIEVABLE. There could be multiple JOKERs living in our society that could shake those around them in much bitter way than the film shows making people uncomforting people. Consider this a wake up call, a message, but first a film. Spides
programme.desc:
Spides: Created by Rainer Matsutani. With Rosabell Laurenti Sellers, Désirée Nosbusch, Falk Hentschel, Francis Fulton-Smith. Murders, disappearances, and strange occurrences begin piling up in connection with the appearance of a new club drug called "Blis"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8629136/","name":"Spides","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcyZjZiMjItMmZmNS00NTEwLTg4NmItOWQyZGNmMThmOTk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjcyMDk5OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Murders, disappearances, and strange occurrences begin piling up in connection with the appearance of a new club drug called "Blis".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8629136/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"timstokes-55732"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Looking Forward to More...","reviewBody":"I've watched the first episode and in fairness there was a pleasantly surreal storyline, a few unpleasant surprises and a few good twists and turns, all good romping fun.

The acting was a fairly level playing field, no-one stood out but no-one was less than professional.

I enjoyed the visuals, actors and story enough to keep me engaged all the way through the episode.

I only watched this programme due to the extreme opposites in terms of reviews and what I feel is an unwarranted rating of 5. thoroughly enjoyed first ep. and cant wait for episode 2 :D","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":519,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"genre":["Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2020-03-05","keywords":"drug","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3065809/","name":"Rosabell Laurenti Sellers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0636440/","name":"Désirée Nosbusch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1571804/","name":"Falk Hentschel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0783904/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314952/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683188/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0559668/","name":"Rainer Matsutani"}]}</script><metacontent="
